nodes.name: testFile
nodes.description: Path to the init command file used as the extraction test target.

nodes.name: result
nodes.description: Extraction result containing all symbols found in the test file.

nodes.name: initCommand
nodes.description: Single-symbol extraction test targeting `registerInitCommand`.

nodes.name: DocParser
nodes.description: Parses documentation markdown files and extracts frontmatter metadata (title, hashes, dependencies).

nodes.name: StaleChecker
nodes.description: Detects when generated docs are out of sync with source code by comparing content hashes.

nodes.name: registerCheckCommand
nodes.description:
Register the `wend check` CLI command.

Scans all generated docs for staleness by comparing source code hashes
against the hashes stored in doc frontmatter. Exits with code 1 if any
stale docs are found (useful for CI).

nodes.name: formatStaleReason
nodes.description: Map a staleness reason code to a human-readable label.

nodes.name: getRelativePath
nodes.description: Convert an absolute path to a path relative to the current working directory.

nodes.name: registerInitCommand
nodes.description:
Register the `wend init` CLI command.

Runs an interactive setup wizard that prompts for output directory,
include/exclude patterns, and writes a `config.yaml` file.

nodes.name: splitGlobPatterns
nodes.description:
Split a comma-separated glob list while preserving commas inside brace sets.
Example: `<pattern-1>,<pattern-2>` => two patterns.

nodes.name: generateConfigYAML
nodes.description: Serialize an init config object to a YAML config file string.

nodes.name: registerServeCommand
nodes.description:
Register the `wend serve` CLI command.

Starts the documentation viewer HTTP server and optionally opens it
in the default browser.

nodes.name: registerStatusCommand
nodes.description:
Register the `wend status` CLI command.

Scans the project for documentation coverage and displays statistics
including a coverage bar, undocumented symbols, and a suggestion for
the next file to document.

nodes.name: registerSyncCommand
nodes.description:
Register the `wend sync` CLI command.

Finds source files, builds the dependency graph, and generates static
markdown documentation for every node. Optionally filters to a target path.

nodes.name: cli
nodes.description: The wend CLI instance, powered by cac.

nodes.name: parsed
nodes.description: Parsed CLI arguments and options.

nodes.name: loadConfig
nodes.description:
Load the wend configuration from `_wend/config.yaml`.

Parses the YAML config file to extract the output directory and
include/exclude scope patterns. Returns null if no config file exists.

structuredParams.name: cwd
structuredParams.description: Working directory to resolve the config path from

nodes.name: parseYamlList
nodes.description:
Parse a YAML list under a given key.
Finds `key:` on its own line, then collects subsequent `- value` lines.
Skips blank lines and comment lines within the list.

nodes.name: stripQuotes
nodes.description: Remove surrounding single or double quotes from a string value.

nodes.name: detectIncludePatterns
nodes.description:
Detect likely source-code include patterns from common project layouts.

Returns candidate patterns in priority order. Falls back to the historical
default when no likely source files are found.

nodes.name: WendError
nodes.description: Base error class for all wend errors.

nodes.name: ConfigError
nodes.description: Thrown when the wend configuration file is invalid or missing required fields.

nodes.name: ValidationError
nodes.description: Thrown when input validation fails (e.g. invalid file paths or symbol names).

nodes.name: ExtractionError
nodes.description: Thrown when symbol extraction from a source file fails.

nodes.name: GenerationError
nodes.description: Thrown when documentation generation fails for a symbol.

nodes.name: computeNextCandidate
nodes.description:
Compute the next file to document from pre-computed data.
Ranks by import count (most-imported first), then by undocumented symbol count.

structuredParams.name: params

nodes.name: renderNextSuggestion
nodes.description: Render the "Next up" suggestion as a bordered note box.

nodes.name: scanProject
nodes.description: Scan the project and return coverage data.

nodes.name: tick
nodes.description: Yield to the event loop so spinner animations stay smooth during CPU-bound work.

nodes.name: scanProjectAsync
nodes.description:
Async version of scanProject that yields throughout
so spinner animations stay smooth.

nodes.name: findSourceFilesAsync
renderCoverageStats
nodes.description: Render coverage stats (source files, symbols, coverage bar).

nodes.name: showCoverageAndSuggestion
nodes.description:
Self-contained: scan the project, show coverage stats and next suggestion.
Use this from commands that don't already have scanning data (e.g. generate).

nodes.name: getRelativePath
nodes.description: Convert an absolute path to a path relative to the current working directory.

nodes.name: findSourceFiles
nodes.description:
Find all source files matching the scope's include/exclude patterns.

Recursively walks the directory tree, applying picomatch patterns to filter
files. Skips `.git` and `node_modules` directories.

nodes.name: findMarkdownFiles
nodes.description:
Recursively find all `.md` files in a directory.

Skips `node_modules` and `.git` directories. Returns an empty array
if the directory doesn't exist or can't be read.

nodes.name: countImports
nodes.description:
Count how many times each source file is imported by other files.

Parses import/export statements from all source files, resolves relative
specifiers, and tallies import counts per file. Used to rank documentation
priority (most-imported files first).

structuredParams.name: sourceFiles
structuredParams.description: List of absolute source file paths

nodes.name: resolveImport
nodes.description:
Resolve a relative import specifier to an absolute file path.

Tries the exact path, then common extensions (`.ts`, `.tsx`, `.js`, `.jsx`),
then `index.*` variants. Only resolves to files in the `sourceFiles` list.

nodes.name: toRelativePath
nodes.description:
Convert an absolute or foreign-worktree file path to a relative path.
Used when writing dependency paths into doc frontmatter.

nodes.name: resolveSourcePath
nodes.description:
Resolve a source file path from doc frontmatter to an absolute path
in the current working directory. Used when reading source files.

nodes.name: commentToString
nodes.description:
/**
 * Normalize a JSDoc comment value to a plain string.
 * The TS API returns either a string or a NodeArray<JSDocComment> depending on
 * whether the comment contains inline tags like {@link ...}.

nodes.name: extractJsDoc
nodes.description:
Extract JSDoc information from a TypeScript AST node.
Returns undefined if no JSDoc comment is found.

For VariableDeclarations (arrow functions, const assignments), the JSDoc is
attached to the parent VariableStatement, so we walk up the tree.

nodes.name: extractParamDescriptions
nodes.description: Extract

nodes.name: extractReturns
nodes.description: Extract

nodes.name: extractExamples
nodes.description: Extract all

nodes.name: extractDeprecated
nodes.description: Extract
nodes.deprecated:
tag. Returns true if present with no reason,
or the reason string if provided.

nodes.name: extractSeeTags
nodes.description: Extract
see:
tags. TheTS compiler parses these as JSDocSeeTag with a
special `name` property containing the reference, so we need dedicated handling.

nodes.name: extractAllTagTexts
nodes.description: Extract all occurrences of a given tag name (e.g. 'throws').

nodes.name: stripJsonComments
nodes.description:
Strip // and /* comments from JSON text without corrupting string literals.
Walks character-by-character, skipping over quoted strings so that
sequences like "@/*" inside paths are preserved.

nodes.name: loadTsconfigPaths
nodes.description:
Find and parse tsconfig.json paths from a source file's directory.
Walks up the directory tree until it finds a tsconfig.json.
Results are cached per tsconfig.json location.

nodes.name: tryResolveFile
nodes.description:
Try to resolve a file path by testing common extensions.
Handles .js → .ts extension swapping for TypeScript ESM projects.

nodes.name: resolveImportPath
nodes.description:
Resolve an import specifier to an absolute file path.

Handles:
- Relative imports (./foo, ../bar)
- tsconfig path aliases (@/lib/foo,

nodes.name: clearTsconfigCache
nodes.description: Clear the tsconfig cache (useful for testing)

nodes.name: TypeScriptExtractor
nodes.description: Extracts symbols (functions, classes, arrow functions, call expressions) from TypeScript/JavaScript files using the TS Compiler API.

nodes.name: StaticDocGenerator
nodes.description: Generates static markdown documentation files from graph nodes. No AI involved — all content comes from static analysis.

nodes.name: getRelativePath
nodes.description:
Compute a path relative to `process.cwd()`.
Keeps node IDs deterministic and human-readable.

nodes.name: connectionTypeToEdgeType
nodes.description:
Map a RuntimeConnection type string to a GraphEdge EdgeType.
Falls back to 'async-dispatch' for unknown connection types.

nodes.name: isAsyncSymbol
nodes.description:
Check whether a symbol's fullText indicates it is async.
Matches `async function`, `async (`, `async =>`  etc.

nodes.name: GraphBuilder
nodes.description: /** Builds a {@link FlowGraph}from TypeScript source files by extracting symbols, detecting entry points, and resolving call edges.

nodes.name: entryPoints
nodes.description: Find all entry point nodes in the graph

nodes.name: reachableFrom
nodes.description:
Find all nodes reachable from a starting node via BFS.
Returns the subgraph (nodes + edges) reachable from the start.

nodes.name: pathsBetween
nodes.description:
Find all paths between two nodes using DFS.
Returns an array of paths, where each path is an array of node IDs.
Limits to maxPaths to avoid combinatorial explosion.

nodes.name: buildAdjacencyList
nodes.description: Build an adjacency list from graph edges (source → [targets])

nodes.name: nodeToMermaid
nodes.description:
Generate a mermaid flowchart for a specific node and its immediate connections.
Used in per-symbol documentation.

nodes.name: flowToMermaid
nodes.description:
Generate a mermaid flowchart for an entire flow (from an entry point).
Shows all nodes reachable from the entry point.

nodes.name: buildMermaid
nodes.description:
Build a mermaid flowchart string from a set of nodes and edges.

Groups nodes into subgraphs by file path, applies styling to the
highlighted node and entry points, and renders edge arrows based on type.

nodes.name: formatNodeLabel
nodes.description: Build a display label for a graph node, including async prefix and metadata.

nodes.name: edgeArrow
nodes.description: Return the mermaid arrow syntax for a given edge type.

nodes.name: sanitizeLabel
nodes.description: Sanitize a label for mermaid (escape characters that break parsing)

nodes.name: sanitizeId
nodes.description: Sanitize a node ID for mermaid (replace special characters)

nodes.name: ContentHasher
nodes.description: SHA256 content hasher for detecting symbol changes. Hashes params + body (not name) so renames don't trigger staleness.

nodes.name: hashSymbol
nodes.description: Convenience function to hash symbol content

nodes.name: extractEventTrigger
nodes.description:
Extract the event name from an inngest.createFunction call.
Looks for patterns like: { event: "user/created" } or { event: "app/image.analyzed" }

nodes.name: extractFunctionId
nodes.description:
Extract the function ID from an inngest.createFunction call.
Looks for patterns like: { id: "analyze-image" }

nodes.name: extractRoutePath
nodes.description:
Extract route path from file path.
e.g. "src/app/api/analyze/route.ts" -> "/api/analyze"

nodes.name: extractPagePath
nodes.description:
Extract page path from file path.
e.g. "src/app/dashboard/page.tsx" -> "/dashboard"

nodes.name: extractTaskId
nodes.description:
Extract the task ID from a task() definition.
Looks for: task({ id: "process-image", ... })

nodes.name: buildSymbolIndex
nodes.description:
Build a lookup index of all documented symbols from the output directory.

Parses every markdown doc file, extracts frontmatter metadata, and builds
two maps: one keyed by doc path, one keyed by symbol name (for cross-referencing).

structuredParams.name: outputDir
structuredParams.description: Path to the wend output directory

nodes.name: extractOverview
nodes.description:
Extract the overview text from a markdown doc file.

Strips frontmatter and the title heading, then returns everything up to
the first `<details>` block or `##` heading.

structuredParams.name: content
structuredParams.description: Raw markdown content of the doc file

nodes.name: extractRelatedSymbols
nodes.description:
Extract related symbol names from a doc file's Related section.

Looks for backtick-wrapped (`SymbolName`) and bold (**SymbolName**) references
inside `<details><summary>Related</summary>` blocks, deduplicating and
excluding the symbol's own name.

structuredParams.name: content
structuredParams.description: Raw markdown content of the doc file

structuredParams.name: selfName
structuredParams.description: Name of the current symbol (excluded from results)

nodes.name: generateDependencyGraph
nodes.description:
Generate a mermaid flowchart showing a symbol's related dependencies.

Creates a left-to-right flowchart with clickable nodes linking to each
related symbol's doc page. Returns null if no related symbols exist in the index.

structuredParams.name: entry
structuredParams.description: The symbol entry to generate the graph for

structuredParams.name: index
structuredParams.description: The full symbol index for resolving related names

nodes.name: buildIndexResponse
nodes.description:
Build the JSON response for the `/api/index` endpoint.

Groups symbol entries by source directory and sorts both directories
and entries alphabetically for the sidebar tree.

nodes.name: buildDocResponse
nodes.description:
Build the JSON response for the `/api/doc` endpoint.

Reads the markdown file, strips frontmatter, and enriches the response
with metadata from the symbol index (dependency graph, related symbols).
Falls back to a basic response if the index is stale.

structuredParams.name: docPath
structuredParams.description: Relative path to the doc file within the output directory

structuredParams.name: index
structuredParams.description: The symbol index for metadata enrichment

structuredParams.name: outputDir
structuredParams.description: Path to the wend output directory

nodes.name: serveStaticFile
nodes.description: Serve a static file with the appropriate Content-Type header.

nodes.name: startServer
nodes.description:
Start the wend documentation viewer HTTP server.

Serves the single-page viewer app, a JSON API for the symbol index and
individual doc pages, and the graph data. Watches the output directory
for changes and rebuilds the index automatically.

If the requested port is taken, retries up to 10 consecutive ports.

structuredParams.name: outputDir
structuredParams.description: Path to the wend output directory (e.g. `_wend`)

structuredParams.name: port
structuredParams.description: Preferred port number to listen on

throws: If no available port is found after 10 attempts

nodes.name: getTemplate
nodes.description:
Return the HTML template for the legacy documentation viewer SPA.

This is a self-contained single-page app with inline CSS and JavaScript
that renders a sidebar tree, search, and markdown doc content.

structuredParams.name:
{
  name,
  node,
  depth,
  guides,
  isLast,
  activeDocPath,
  forceExpand,
  collapsedDirs,
  onToggleDir,
  dirPath,
}

{
  entryPoints,
  selectedEntry,
  onSelectEntry,
  searchQuery,
  onSearch,
  nodeCount,
  edgeCount,
  availableTypes,
  enabledTypes,
  onToggleType,
  onSoloType,
  onResetTypes,
  showConditionals,
  onToggleConditionals,
  hasConditionalEdges,
}

{
  className,
  children,
  side = 'right',
  overlay = false,
  showCloseButton = false,
  ...props
}

nodes.name: docPathToUrl
nodes.description: Convert a docPath (e.g. "src/checker/index/StaleChecker.md") to a URL path

nodes.name: urlToDocPath
nodes.description: Convert a URL pathname back to a docPath for the API

nodes.name: escapeHtml
nodes.description: Escape HTML special characters to prevent XSS in rendered content.

nodes.name: snapCeil
nodes.description: Round a value up to the nearest multiple of SNAP_CEIL_SIZE (GRID_SIZE * 2).

nodes.name: cn
nodes.description: Merge Tailwind CSS class names, resolving conflicts via `tailwind-merge`.
